sentence.Network_en: He applies the Marxist world view dogmatically to all social phenomena.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将马克思主义的世界观教条地应用到所有的社会现象中去。

sentence.Network_en: This revisionist thesis departs even further from Marxist assertions.
sentence.Network_cn: 这篇修正主义的论文更加偏离了马克思主义的主张。

sentence.Network_en: The film retells the famous legend with a Marxist spin.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影用马克思主义的观点重述了那个著名的传说.

entry.tran: 马克思主义的；与马克思主义有关的
entry.def: Marxist means based on Marxism or relating to Marxism.

example.tran: 信奉马克思主义的国家

entry.tran: 马克思主义者;马克思主义政党成员
entry.def: A Marxist is a person who believes in Marxism or who is a member of a Marxist party.

means.word_mean: 2. emotionally charged terms used to refer to extreme radicals or revolutionaries
